Reviews.Content: Concept very different My wife and I did not visit Bali since getting married 12 years ago and when we did decide to take a break, we found this place which was 2 1/2 hrs away from Denpasar but what they offered us was a complete experience for one price.The journey in the luxurious vehicle made it worth our while and the check in was just fantastic, a feet wash with fine black sand from the beach(yes this place has black sand unlike the sand in other places) and I must say I was surprised and followed by a 20 minute head and neck massage to take all the tiredness away.Our itinerary was given to us since we told them that we are coming for a break from the daily stress of working life and this itinerary covered a selection of spa treatments at various times based on our needs. Our meals were all included and they had us on the yoga program, a cooking class, some creative drawing, making of the spa ingredients and jamu drinks etc.On one night we went on this traditional boat, Jukung for a sunset cruise and it was marvelous. They also have a stargazing section and oops, my camera dropped in the pool and so no pictures......but I will be back there again.All staff are very warm and friendly and as a Malaysian, I think the Balinese hospitality is excellent.
Reviews.Author: Spafinder

Reviews.Content: Great start to Honeymoon We have just come back from a honeymoon in Bali and spent the first 4 nites in the Spa Village. It was a wonderful experience. We enjoyed every minute of it. The atmosphere is very relaxing and authentic. the food/staff everything is great. There is something for everyone. We would recommend giving the suggested activities a go even if you have not done similar thing sinthe past. Really blissfula nd enjoyable time.
Reviews.Author: karenf168

Reviews.Content: paradise on earth This hotel is just superb. I went away a stressed, tired lawyer and came back human! The hotel is fabulous....try and get a villa if you can... and the level of service of some of the best I have had. The attentiom to detail here, to ensure that you have the most amazing life changing holiday, is what makes it... I have booked an annual rejuvenating stay. It is not for those looking for a party filled time but for those looking to recharge, you can not beat it.
Reviews.Author: stressedlawyer

Reviews.Content: beautyful and secluded Certainly a fabuous experience. Knew the resort from before the renovations but never stayed because of service and food quality. Now it has become a real gem and my partner and I really enjoyed our stay. THe rooms are redecorated, wonderful activities and the charm of a peaceful hideway. Everybody is so friendly and helpful. THis is the real bali like 25 years ago...
Reviews.Author: Kaori

Reviews.Content: Where is the charm of Bali? We were there when the resort on refurbishment stage. Thought we could reserve a room for our summer vacations. We used to stay there 2 years a go. The resort that time was simple with authentic Balinese style service given by the staff and the lady who managed the resort was really helpful. Although, the resort is now turning into more an up-scale hotel. We did not see this Bali charm hospitality as it used to be. Everybody were so stiff and the Manager was not polite. So we decided to book another hotel. However, we are sad to know that this property becoming a not welcomed property as it used to be. What a shame.
Reviews.Author: Isabel,Germany
